definition: according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: You work on your muscle groups in a certain order.
sentences.chinese: 對各個肌肉羣，你是在按照一個特定的順序進行。

sentences.english: The ratio of commissions to be collected shall be set in accordance with the principle of making an inverse ratio to the auction completion price.
sentences.chinese: 收取佣金的比例按照同拍賣成交價成反比的原則確定。

sentences.english: Methods It was carried out in the line with the national monitoring scenario for KBD.
sentences.chinese: 方法按照國家大骨節病監測方案進行。

sentences.english: You can select and move multiple artifacts in this manner.
sentences.chinese: 您可以按照這種方式選擇並移動多個工件。

sentences.english: According to legal effect and content, our compellent technical standards should be one of technique regulations.
sentences.chinese: 按照法律效力和內容，我國強制性標準就是技術法規。

sentences.english: The man cocked his hat in the latest fashion.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人按照最近時興的方式歪戴着帽子。

sentences.english: Follow these steps to map subunits to existing models and packages.
sentences.chinese: 按照以下的步驟來將子單元映射爲已存在的模型和包。

sentences.english: Each time a child follows through with a task, he receives a sticker.
sentences.chinese: 每次孩子按照指示做完家務，他都會得到一個貼紙。

sentences.english: You could define fields to be accessed relationally on a per-form or per-database basis.
sentences.chinese: 可以按照表或者數據庫定義以關係方式訪問的字段。

sentences.english: Predictability is the ability of a machine to behave as expected.
sentences.chinese: 可預測性是機器按照期望的那樣來運轉的能力。

sentences.english: This job is for 1hr of work to see if you follow instructions carefully.
sentences.chinese: 這項工作是爲了看看你是否仔細按照說明工作1小時。

sentences.english: Take your diabetes meds as prescribed.
sentences.chinese: 按照醫生的規定服用糖尿病藥物。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 掛號信件，按照國務院郵政主管部門規定的金額賠償。

sentences.english: The customer might not follow the prescribed steps exactly when required.
sentences.chinese: 客戶可能不會在需要時完全按照規定的步驟進行。

sentences.english: According to the act of grace many prisoners will be set free.
sentences.chinese: 按照大赦令，很多囚犯獲得釋放。

sentences.english: The power to interpret the present Supplementary Provisions shall remain with the Ministry of Construction and the Ministry of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 本補充規定由建設部和商務部按照各自職責負責解釋。

definition: to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
